original_text: Then he brought me out to the outer court and led me around to the four corners of the court. And behold, in each corner of the court there was another court—
korean_text: 나를 데리고 바깥뜰로 나가서 나를 뜰 네 구석을 지나가게 하시는데 본즉 그 뜰 매 구석에 또 뜰이 있는데

sentences.original_text: Then he brought me out to the outer court
and led me around to the four corners of the court.
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 이끌고 뜰의 네 모퉁이로 돌았다.

sentences.original_text: in each corner of the court
